mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET Odate = #{odate}, TXNUM = #{txnum}, TITLE = #{title}, ISBN = #{isbn}, PRICE = #{price}, UNIT = #{unit}, EXTRACOST = #{extracost}, DESCRIPT = #{descript}, TOTALCOST = #{totalcost} WHERE ORDERNUM = #{ordernum}
update booklist set bcount = bcount+1 where bid = #{bid}
update rentinfo set exdate = to_date(exdate,'yy-mm-dd') + 5 , isExpanded = 1 where renbid = #{renbid} and renemail = #{renemail}
mapper.delete: delete from rentinfo where renbid=#{renbid} and renemail=#{renemail}
mapper.insert: insert into resinfo(resid, resemail,resbid,resdate) values((select nvl(max(resid),0)+1 from resinfo),#{resemail},#{resbid},sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from resinfo where resbid=#{resbid} and resemail = #{resemail}
